snippet: A record harvest in the United States depressed prices, leading farmers in South America and elsewhere to sow fewer corn seeds.
lead_paragraph: A record harvest in the United States depressed prices, leading farmers in South America and elsewhere to sow fewer corn seeds.

headline.main: Monsanto’s Earnings Fall as Corn Glut Hurts Demand
headline.print_headline: Monsanto’s Earnings Fall as Corn Glut Hurts Demand
